titleInfo.title: Clark Gable and Myrna Loy in "Wife vs. Secretary"

mods.abstract: "Wife vs. Secretary" tells the story of Van Stanhope (Clark Gable), an industrious magazine publisher who is happily married to Linda (Myrna Loy). Although his secretary, Helen "Whitey" Wilson (Jean Harlow), is in love with him, she respects his marriage and takes pains to ensure that their relationship remains strictly professional. Linda is suspicious, however, especially since her mother (May Robson) frequently suggests that Van is being unfaithful. These suspicions are apparently confirmed when Van takes Whitey on an important business trip to Cuba. Linda is infuriated, but Whitey manages to convince her that her husband has never betrayed her, thus saving their marriage.
